clementine.translation[0].definitions[0]: a kind of small sweet orange
clementine.translation[1].definitions[0]: a folk song about a girl who drowns (=dies from being under water). In the US it is typically sung not in a serious way, but in a humorous way with a southern US accent
Oh my darling, oh my darling, /Oh my darling, Clementine;/Thou art lost and gone forever, /Dreadful sorry, Clementine.
